thread.title: Bank of England sees rates rising higher, sooner

title: Bank of England sees rates rising higher, sooner
text:
Bank of England sees rates rising higher, sooner Thursday, February 08, 2018 - 01:46 
The Bank of England said on Thursday interest rates probably need to rise sooner and by a bit more than it thought only three months ago, because Britain's slow-moving economy is getting a boost from the global recovery. David Pollard reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The Bank of England said on Thursday interest rates probably need to rise sooner and by a bit more than it thought only three months ago, because Britain's slow-moving economy is getting a boost from the global recovery.
